CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Potatoes?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Potatoes is arc {Soybeans}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Soybeans?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Soybeans is arc {Potatoes}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Corn to Soybeans in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Potatoes to Corn in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Corn and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Corn and Soybeans is {153}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Potatoes and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Potatoes and Soybeans is {214}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Potatoes?
SC.A: The total flow output from Potatoes is {523}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Soybeans?
SC.A: The total flow input by Soybeans is {545}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 183? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {432} from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans}, a flow of {214} from {Soybeans} to {Potatoes}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 83? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {75} from {Corn} to {Potatoes}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 102 and 183? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {153} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}, a flow of {113} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Corn to Soybeans or from Soybeans to Potatoes?
NC.A: The flow from {Soybeans} to {Potatoes} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Corn to Potatoes, from Potatoes to Soybeans, or from Potatoes to Corn?
NC.A: The flow from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Potatoes}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Potatoes} and {Soybeans}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Soybeans, Arc Potatoes, Arc Corn}.
